independence-declaration: This is a community-made project. This tool is not endorsed by DiamondFire or DiamondFire staff!
text-helper-explanation: Text Helper is a tool that allows you to create stylized text for DiamondFire text values! You can use it to create text for signs, books, chat messages and more!
color-codes-explanation: On DiamondFire, you have the ability customize your text color using minecraft color codes but with a & instead of a §, or html color codes in a special format. Text Helper allows you to write html color codes in their typical format #rrggbb, and it will automatically convert them to the DiamondFire format.
color-codes-example: Example: #ff0000red text&3blue text will be converted to &x&f&f&0&0&0&0red text&3blue text
emphasis-explanation: DiamondFire also allows you to use minecraft format codes (with & instead of §) to emphasize text. For example, &l will make the text bold.
emphasis-explanation-2:
The problem with this feature is that removing single emphasis tags while keeping others can be difficult.
If you want to add a word after &lbold &obold+italic which is italic but not bold, you have to remove both tags and reapply the italic tag again. Text Helper allows you to use markdown-like syntax to make this easier.
emphasis-example: Example: **This is in bold, _italics_, ~~and strikethrough~~** will be converted to &lThis is in bold, &l&oitalics&r&l, &l&mand strikethrough
fonts-explanation: Text Helper also allows you to use char fonts. Char fonts replace specific characters with other characters. For example, the Small Capital font replaces A with ᴀ and DIAMONDFIRE with ᴅɪᴀᴍᴏɴᴅꜰɪʀᴇ. You can use multiple fonts at the same time.
fonts-details: Full details about fonts can be found here.
tag-backslash: Escapes the next character. For example, \&r will be converted to &r.
tag-html-color: Converts the color to the DiamondFire format. For example, #ff0000red text will be converted to &x&f&f&0&0&0&0red text.
tag-df-color: DiamondFire color codes. For example, &cred text will be displayed red in Minecraft.
tag-emphasis: Emphasis tags. For example, **bold text** will be converted to &lbold text.
custom-fonts-explanation: Text Helper offers the posibility to create and upload custom fonts. A font is a json file with a simple format.
custom-fonts-format: The value of the key "_name" represents the font name. It has to be a unique name for functioning correctly.
custom-fonts-format-2: Every following key-value pair is now a char translation, Text Helper will replace every character that matches a key in your font dictionary with the corresponding value. Mark that keys can only be one character wheras the value can be a longer text.
